page.title: 06RECREATION IN BARNOLDSWICK
page.content: We did a survey of the things some of the local people enjoy doing in their spare time. Knitting and needlework is the most popular with the ladies. Sports are very popular too as there are many sport facilities in and around Barnoldswick. We have a local swimming pool and tennis courts. We have football pitches and a golf course. In Victory Park there is a bowling green. Next comes watching television. This is not quite as popular as sports and needlework. Reading and gardening are much enjoyed pastimes. We have a local library and many gardens and allotments. Quite a few people enjoy walking. The scenery around Barnoldswick is quite picturesque. Some of the ladies enjoy cooking and baking.
